hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Idris that :The Prophet [SAW] saw a gold ring on a man's hand and he struck his finger with a stick that he had with him, until he threw it away

chapter.ara-name: باب حَدِيثِ أَبِي هُرَيْرَةَ وَالاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى قَتَادَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Hadith of Abu Hurairah and the Differences Reported from Qatadah
